name: CURIOMON
description:
CURIOMON is a little monster catching game/toy I made.  you can pick a starter that will have a randomly generated sprite, color and typing. (There are 50 different types as well as Multi-Types, meaning there are 2500 separate type combinations!!!) you go on a search for the coolest monsters. by walking on a tile with a Curiomon, you can swap it out for your partner monster and have it follow you, letting you view it's list of stats.

Credits:  

  • Dec_To_Hex & Color_To_Hex Scripts by GMLscripts.com. 
  • Random generation Inspired by 2Draw's Random Ship Generator
  • Frogblock Font by Polyducks

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • ENTER to select 
  • walking outside the map resets the game.

Please Feel free to share Screenshots of your favorite Curiomon finds, or fanart! you can use monster concepts generated by the game for whatever you like, no credit required. :)
